data.message: How do you access the new buttons....I still only see "like"

replies.message: Thanks for reaching out, Pam. We recommend that you update your mobile app in order to have access to Reactions. If you're still having trouble, please let us know: http://on.fb.me/1RowcHr. -Jordan
Pat...on your phone ptess and hold the like button until the emoji appear.  On your computer hover your cursor over the like button until they appear!

Some people (at least 3 of my friends) cannot see these even with the upgrade. My friends who have access to these features can log in on my phone and computer and the buttons are there. When I log back into my account, they all disappear. I am not even notified when someone "reacts" to my posts, so I had no idea anyone even was.
Me too and i just updated.. Doesn't work
